title: Korean Chicken Strips
instructions: Cut the planted.chicken into strips if not already. Coat in cornstarch seasoned with salt, pepper, and a pinch of gochugaru.
Heat oil in a deep pan or wok. Fry the chicken strips in batches until extra crispy, about 4-5 minutes. Drain on paper towels.
Prepare the Korean sauce: combine gochujang paste, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, minced garlic, ginger, and honey (or agave). Simmer until slightly thickened.
Toss the crispy planted.chicken strips in the warm sauce until evenly coated.
For extra crunch, double-fry: re-fry the sauced strips briefly for 1 minute.
Serve immediately topped with toasted sesame seeds and thinly sliced scallions. Pair with pickled radish and steamed rice.
